item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Okay well I made a dragon kiteshield and then this is the code… if(i == 8001){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.aString170 = "Dragon kiteshield"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A rare, protective kiteshield.".getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = 13701; class8.anInt181 = 1560; class8.anInt190 = 344; class8.anInt198 = 1104; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = -14; class8.anInt165 = 13700; class8.anInt200 = 13700; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

so then I do everythign right and everything then I log in and then do add model 13700 and add model 13701 and then I press weild and it weild it like a weapon, please tell em how to fix it so that ts a shield, answer = owner.

Read full topic
